partner_id.label: Partner ID
partner_id.comment: Unique user number of signed Alipay account. Beginning with "2088", it is compose of 16 numbers.

security_code.label: Private Keys
security_code.comment: After logonning to Merchant Service Center (https://b.alipay.com/) and installing a digital certificate, merchants can view the private keys by clicking "Transaction Security Code" in the "Technical Services" Column.

notify_ips.label: Notify IPs
notify_ips.comment: Server IPs of Alipay sending notifications

support_custom_timeout.label: Has Configured to Support Custom Timeout

allow_refund_time.label: Allow Refund Time
allow_refund_time.comment:
The deadline of allowing buyer to refund when seller fails to delivery.
Its unit is d that means day. For example: 7d

suggest_refund_time.label: Suggest Refund Time
suggest_refund_time.comment:
The deadline of suggesting buyer to refund when seller fails to delivery.
Its unit is d that means day. For example: 7d

post_receipt_timeout.label: POST Receipt Timeout
post_receipt_timeout.comment:
The deadline of completing automatically the (post) transaction when buyer fails to confirm receipt.
Its unit is d that means day. For example: 7d

pay_timeout.label: Pay Timeout
pay_timeout.comment:
Set unpaid transaction timeout, once timeout, the transaction will automatically be closed.
The range of values is 1m-15d, where m is replace of minute, h is replace of hour, d is replace of day, and 1c is the replace of that day. Its number part must be interger.

error_notify.label: Has Opened the Function of Request Error Notification
error_notify.comment: This function need to contact Alipay to open.

credit_pay.label: Has Opened the Function of Credit Pay
credit_pay.comment: This function need to contact Alipay to open.

ctu_check.label: Has Configured to Support CTU Check Permissions
ctu_check.comment: CTU is Alipay risk audit system.

antiphishing_timestamp_verify.label: Has Opened the Function of Antiphishing Timestamp Verify
antiphishing_timestamp_verify.comment: This function need to contact Alipay to open.

alipay_bank.label: Internet Banking Payment
alipay_bank.comment: Note It can be signed and enabled only after Alipay Instant Credit Transactions have been successful sign.
